tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_component_description AS SELECT DISTINCT a.amp_activity_id, b.description AS title, b.amp_component_id FROM amp_activity a, amp_components b, amp_component_funding c WHERE ((a.amp_activity_id = c.activity_id) AND (b.amp_component_id = c.amp_component_id));;;
